lead_paragraph: SPRAYREGEN--Nick. Congregation Rodeph Sholom mourns the untimely death of our longtime member, Nick Sprayregen, beloved husband of Jaynee Sprayregen. We will miss his incredible caring and devotion to family, friends and community. Our heartfelt condolences to Jaynee, the children Matthew, Emily, Jonathan, Benjamin and Lilee, Karen Sprayregen and all their dear ones. Robert N. Levine, DD, Senior Rabbi Martin Flumenbaum, President 1/3
